paper_abstract: In this paper we establish bounds for the main parameters of parameterized codes associated to the edges of a simple graph by using the relationships among these parameters and the corresponding ones of the parameterized codes associated to the edges of any subgraph of . These inequalities are used to find bounds in the case of complete r-partite graphs.
paper_title: Parameterized codes associated to the edges of some subgraphs of a simple graph
